bibl.title: Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007. (American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition.)
bibl.publisher: The University of Michigan Library. Scholarly Publishing Office
bibl.note: 1 portrait coul. en front., tabl., figg. n./bl. et coul.

The volume is dedicated to Traianos GAGOS (1960-2010). - Pp. xiii: Tr.G., Preface [with an addendum by A.H., Arthur VERHOOGT and Terry WILFONG]; - xv: Organization of the Congress; - xvii-xxvii: List of Participants; - xxix-xxxvi: Program of the Congress; - 789-793: Subject Index.
bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007. (American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition.)

Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Library. Scholarly Publishing Office, 2010, 8°, xxxviii-793 pp., 1 portrait coul. en front., tabl., figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-1-60785-205-6. $59.95. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://quod.lib.umich.edu/i/icp/ >.]

The volume is dedicated to Traianos GAGOS (1960-2010). - Pp. xiii: Tr.G., Preface [with an addendum by A.H., Arthur VERHOOGT and Terry WILFONG]; - xv: Organization of the Congress; - xvii-xxvii: List of Participants; - xxix-xxxvi: Program of the Congress; - 789-793: Subject Index.
